00009 module output

00011   implicit none
00012   private
00013   public :: print_heading
00014 
00015 contains

00017 !===============================================================================
00018 ! PRINT_HEADING
00021 
00022   subroutine print_heading()
00023 
00024     use global, only: VERSION_MAJOR,VERSION_MINOR,VERSION_RELEASE
00025 
00026     ! local variables
00027     character(len=10) :: today_date
00028     character(len=8)  :: today_time
00029 
00030     ! write header
00031     write(*, FMT='(/9(A/))') &
00032   & ' .d8888b.  888                        888b     d888  .d8888b.    ',       &
00033   & 'd88P  Y88b 888                        8888b   d8888 d88P  Y88b   ',       &
00034   & 'd88P  Y88b 888                        8888b   d8888 d88P  Y88b   ',       &
00035   & 'd88P  Y88b 888                        8888b   d8888 d88P  Y88b   ',       &
00036   & ' "Y888b.   888  .d88b.  888  888  888 888Y88888P888 888          ',       &
00037   & '    "Y88b. 888 d88""88b 888  888  888 888 Y888P 888 888          ',       &
00038   & '      "888 888 888  888 888  888  888 888  Y8P  888 888    888   ',       &
00039   & 'Y88b  d88P 888 Y88..88P Y88b 888 d88P 888   "   888 Y88b  d88P   ',       &
00040   & ' "Y8888P"  888  "Y88P"   "Y8888888P"  888       888  "Y8888P"    '
00041 
00042     ! Write version information
00043     write(*, FMT=*)                                                            &
00044  &    '     Developed At:  Massachusetts Institute of Technology'
00045     write(*, FMT='(6X,"Version:",7X,I1,".",I1,".",I1)')                        &
00046  &        VERSION_MAJOR, VERSION_MINOR, VERSION_RELEASE
00047 
00048     ! Write the date and time
00049     call get_today(today_date, today_time)
00050     write(*, FMT='(6X,"Date/Time:",5X,A,1X,A)')                                &
00051  &      trim(today_date), trim(today_time)
00052 
00053 
00054     ! write out divider
00055     write(*,FMT='(A/)') '------------------------------------------------------'
00056 
00057   end subroutine print_heading
00058 
00059 !===============================================================================
00060 ! GET_TODAY
00063 
00064   subroutine get_today(today_date, today_time)
00065 
00066     character(10), intent(out) :: today_date
00067     character(8),  intent(out) :: today_time
00068 
00069     integer       :: val(8)
00070     character(8)  :: date_
00071     character(10) :: time_
00072     character(5)  :: zone
00073 
00074     call date_and_time(date_, time_, zone, val)
00075     ! val(1) = year (YYYY)
00076     ! val(2) = month (MM)
00077     ! val(3) = day (DD)
00078     ! val(4) = timezone
00079     ! val(5) = hours (HH)
00080     ! val(6) = minutes (MM)
00081     ! val(7) = seconds (SS)
00082     ! val(8) = milliseconds
00083 
00084     if (val(2) < 10) then
00085        if (val(3) < 10) then
00086           today_date = date_(6:6) // "/" // date_(8:8) // "/" // date_(1:4)
00087        else
00088           today_date = date_(6:6) // "/" // date_(7:8) // "/" // date_(1:4)
00089        end if
00090     else
00091        if (val(3) < 10) then
00092           today_date = date_(5:6) // "/" // date_(8:8) // "/" // date_(1:4)
00093        else
00094           today_date = date_(5:6) // "/" // date_(7:8) // "/" // date_(1:4)
00095        end if
00096     end if
00097     today_time = time_(1:2) // ":" // time_(3:4) // ":" // time_(5:6)
00098 
00099   end subroutine get_today
00100 
00101 end module output
